content:
function _fzf_nested_file_unrestricted_widget -d "Paste selected file (including hidden) into command line"
    set -l file (fd --type f . -H | fzf --height 50% --border)
    if test -n "$file"
        commandline -i -- (string escape -- "$file")
    end
    commandline -f repaint
end
